channel.title: Embodied AI on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in Embodied AI on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Architect: Generating Vivid and Interactive 3D Scenes with Hierarchical 2D Inpainting
item.description: ARCHITECT: Generating realistic 3D scenes using hierarchical 2D inpainting!

item.title: Exploratory Retrieval-Augmented Planning For Continual Embodied Instruction Following
item.description: ExRAP: A novel framework boosts embodied AI’s continual instruction following by cleverly combining environment exploration with LLM-based planning, leading to significantly improved task success and …

item.title: GenRL: Multimodal-foundation world models for generalization in embodied agents
item.description: GenRL: Learn diverse embodied tasks from vision & language, without reward design, using multimodal imagination!

item.title: SG-Nav: Online 3D Scene Graph Prompting for LLM-based Zero-shot Object Navigation
item.description: SG-Nav achieves state-of-the-art zero-shot object navigation by leveraging a novel 3D scene graph to provide rich context for LLM-based reasoning.

item.title: Trajectory Diffusion for ObjectGoal Navigation
item.description: Trajectory Diffusion (T-Diff) significantly improves object goal navigation by learning sequential planning through trajectory diffusion, resulting in more accurate and efficient navigation.
